text: The 2013 FA Cup Final was the 132nd final of the FA Cup, the world's oldest football cup competition. The final took place on the 11 May 2013 at Wembley Stadium. Premier League clubs Manchester City and Wigan Athletic took part in the 2013 final, with Wigan Athletic defeating Manchester City 1â€“0 after an injury time goal from Ben Watson. ==References== Category:2013 in association football Category:Football competitions in the United Kingdom Category:Sport in London Category:The Football Association Category:2013 in London
title: 2013 FA Cup Final
